orders.text: Attack between the Groveton rd and Pageland ln, in order to control the turnpike and prevent the movement of Union troops eastward. At nightfall, fall back to Unfinished rr and defend.
Defend the Unfinished rr between the Groveton-Sudley rd and Bull Run.
Defend the area north of Warrenton Turnpike, between Pageland ln and Groveton-Sudley rd, against Confederate attack.
Move to within one hex of B33.19 and go into line and halt for the night.
